Jargon Term: You were transferred to the medicine service as you started to improve and your antibiotics were changed to ceftriaxone.
You will need to complete antibiotics for a total of 10 days.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: You should follow up with your urologist to discuss the need for further testing in regards to your recurrent urinary infections and methods of prevention.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: Please START taking - ceftriaxone 1 gram intravenously daily for 10 days (last day [**2-20**])
- lovenox 80 mg subcutenously twice daily (please continue to use until 2 days after your INR is therapeutic)
Please CHANGE - lasix 40 mg from twice daily to once daily. This may be increased to twice daily as tolerated.
Please take the rest of your medications as prescribed and follow up with your doctors
